title: Streamerr
description: A platform supporting live video streaming using NextJs, React, Prisma, Tailwind, and MongoDB.

title: TopicTree
description: A dynamic post-loading platform created with React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, Prisma, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI, and NextAuth.js.

title: Luxora
description: E-commerce platform using MERN stack and Redux for state management.
